long_description: Perfect for warm-weather treks along your favorite trails, the Compass Hat from Sunday Afternoons delivers cool comfort thanks to lightweight fabric, a wide brim and breeze-friendly ventilation. Soft, lightweight nylon fabric resists rain, stains and packs flat for easy transport; dark coloring under brim reduces glare. 2 fabric panels on the crown cover polyester mesh panels; just flip them up for increased ventilation. Built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. 4.5 in. brim keeps face and neck completely shaded. Sunday Afternoons Compass Hat features a moisture-wicking internal headband and adjustable chinstrap.
short_description: Perfect for warm-weather treks along your favorite trails, the Compass Hat from Sunday Afternoons delivers cool comfort thanks to lightweight fabric, a wide brim and breeze-friendly ventilation.
